entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Ottawa (Kanata - Orléans)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:13 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Pellets, -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Condition: Ice Pellets
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 10 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: ENE 33 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to freezing rain near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of freezing rain and a thunderstorm this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and after midnight. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
